summary: Hendrik Goltzius, a late sixteenth-century Dutch printer and engraver of erotic prints, seduces the Margrave of Alsace into paying for a printing press to make and publish illustrated books.
cast: Ramsey Nasr|F. Murray Abraham|Hendrik Aerts|Boris Bakal|Giulio Berruti|Francesco De Vito|Pippo Delbono|Lars Eidinger|Anne Louise Hassing|Lisette Malidor|Kate Moran|Nada Abrus|Flavio Parenti|Hermann Ackermann|Sanna Anemaet|Ruth Becker|Goran Bogdan|Truus de Boer|Klaas de Groot|Lianne Diederen|Henriette Frans|Romaine Gijsberti Hodenpijl|Herman Hulsman|Tvrtko Juric|Vedran Komericki|Maaike Neuville|Milan Plestina|Halina Reijn|Vincent Riotta|Stefano Scherini|Dusko Valentic|Enes Vejzovic|Samir Vujcic|Vedran Zivolic|Katja Zupcic
keywords: adam and eve|biblical tale|freedom of the press|reference to god|erotism
title: Goltzius and the Pelican Company
